title: DalBook
description: This is a project made for Dalhousie students to connects and engage with thier friends.

title: Transect Visualization
description: Developed an interactive platform that visualizes coastal transect data in an accessible and engaging way, helping researchers and stakeholders monitor environmental changes and make informed decisions.

title: Student Observation Tool
description: Helped build a web-based tool that supports professors in monitoring and managing student progress and performance.
